job.title: Software Engineer I (start dates in September)
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtHey Were GrubhubltstronggtltpgtltpgtWere all about connecting hungry diners with our network of over 300000 restaurants nationwide Innovative technology userfriendly platforms and streamlined delivery capabilities set us apart and make us an industry leader in the world of online food ordering When you join our team you become part of a community that works together to innovate solve problems grow work hard and have a ton of fun in the processltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhy Work For UsltstronggtltpgtltpgtWe are looking for entry level engineering talent to join our organization ASAP Grubhub is a place where authentically fun culture meets innovation and teamwork We believe in empowering people and opening doors for new opportunities If youre looking for a place that values strong relationships embraces diverse ideasall while having fun togetherGrubhub is the place for youltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtThe Impact You Will MakeltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtDesign implement and deliver awesome technical platforms and products for all constituencies diners corporate accounts restaurants internal toolsltligtltligtUnderstand our products from both a technical and business perspective in the context of our larger businessltligtltligtCommunicate with leadership product owners other technologists and users to create working software based on an understanding of business and technical prioritiesltligtltligtBreak down complex problems into elegant technical solutions to intelligently solve problems for diners restaurant corporate accounts and internal stakeholdersltligtltligtActively contribute to the adoption of strong software architecture development best practices and new technologies We are always improving the process of building software we need you to help contributeltligtltligtYou will be a key part in accurately estimating the timing of software deliveryltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhat You Bring to the TableltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBachelors or Masters Degree in Computer Science Software Engineering or related fieldltligtltligtStrong track record of strong academic performance and handson internship experienceltligtltligtSolid foundation in software programming in one or more of the following languagesampnbspJava Python C C Scala CltligtltligtEagerness to contribute in a teamoriented environmentltligtltligtAbility to work creatively and analytically in a problemsolving environmentltligtltligtFamiliar with Agile software development methodologiesltligtltligtInterested in working for a fast paced tech and product oriented companyltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtAnd Of Course PerksltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtltstronggtFlexible PTOltstronggt Grubhub employees enjoy a generous amount of time to rechargeltligtltligtltstronggtHealth and Wellnessltstronggt Excellent medical benefits employee network groups and paid parental leave are just a few of our programs to support your overall wellbeingltligtltligtltstronggtCompetitive Payltstronggt Youll receive a competitive base salary with eligibility for generous incentives bonuses commission or RSUs rolespecificltligtltligtltstronggtLearning and Career Growthltstronggt Your personal and professional development is a priority at Grubhub We empower you to be a leader and grow your career through training coaching and mentorship opportunitiesampnbspampnbspltligtltligtltstronggtMealPerksltstronggt Get meals on us Our employees get a weekly Grubhub credit to enjoy and support local restaurantsampnbspltligtltligtltstronggtFunltstronggt Every Grubhub office has an employeeled Culture Crew that connects people through fun meaningful events and initiatives like Wellness Wednesdays Slack competitions and virtual happy hoursltligtltligtltstronggtSocial Impactltstronggt At Grubhub we believe in giving back through programs like the Grubhub Community Relief Fund and donating 1 million to the Equal Justice Initiative in 2020 Employees are also given paid time off each year to support the causes that are important to themampnbspltligtltligtltstronggtCOVID19 Responseltstronggt All of our employees are currently working from home and will be for the foreseeable future We look forward to seeing everyone inoffice when its safe to returnampnbspltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltemgtGrubhub is an equal opportunity employer We welcome diversity and encourage a workplace that is just as diverse as the customers we serve We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race color religion age sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin disability veteran status and other legally protected characteristics If youre applying for a job in the US and need a reasonable accommodation for any part of the employment process please send an email to campusrecruitinggrubhubcom and let us know the nature of your request and contact information Please note that only those inquiries concerning a request for reasonable accommodation will be responded to from this email addressampnbspltemgtltpgt
